physical_appearance: This is a purple chania silk skirt. It features a repeated embroided diamond pattern with red and yellow cross stitches in the center. It is a mid-length skirt, with a ruffled hem.
sgcool_label_text: This is a finely embroidered silk skirt, or chania, worn by the Jain community of western Kutch.
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Skirts Motifs Embroidery Jains
